td: {"@context":"https://www.w3.org/2019/wot/td/v1","id":"tag:storageRack","title":"storageRack","description":"VL10 storage rack with a Cartesian robot and a conveyor belt. It can be used as a conveying workshop: The Cartesian robot can be used to move on the XZ-plane, pick up items from the storage rack and place them on the one end of the conveyor belt.","securityDefinitions":{"with_auth":{"scheme":"basic"}},"security":["with_auth"],"properties":{"stackLightStatus":{"readOnly":true,"description":"Reads the status of the workshop (e.g. the status is 'yellow' when the workshop is resetting.)","enum":["green","yellow","red"],"writeOnly":false,"observable":false,"forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/storageRack/properties/stackLightStatus","contentType":"application/json","op":["readproperty"],"htv:methodName":"GET"}]},"capacity":{"readOnly":true,"description":"Reads the capacity of the 2D storage rack E.g. a [5,5] capacity indicates that the rack has 5 rows (X axis) and 5 columns (Z axis), and it can store at most 25 items.","type":"array","maxItems":2,"minItems":2,"items":{"type":"number"},"writeOnly":false,"observable":false,"forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/storageRack/properties/capacity","contentType":"application/json","op":["readproperty"],"htv:methodName":"GET"}]},"positionX":{"readOnly":true,"description":"Reads the position of the Cartesian motor on the X axis (in meters).","type":"number","writeOnly":false,"observable":false,"forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/storageRack/properties/positionX","contentType":"application/json","op":["readproperty"],"htv:methodName":"GET"}]},"positionZ":{"readOnly":true,"description":"Reads the position of the Cartesian motor on the Z axis (in meters).","type":"number","writeOnly":false,"observable":false,"forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/storageRack/properties/positionZ","contentType":"application/json","op":["readproperty"],"htv:methodName":"GET"}]},"clampStatus":{"readOnly":true,"description":"Reads the status of the clamp of the Cartesian robot. The status is true if the clamp is closed, and false if the clamp is open.","type":"boolean","writeOnly":false,"observable":false,"forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/storageRack/properties/clampStatus","contentType":"application/json","op":["readproperty"],"htv:methodName":"GET"}]},"conveyorSpeed":{"description":"Reads and writes the speed (X axis) of the conveyor belt (and the Cartesian robot that moves along the belt) (in meters/sec). The maximum speed is 1 meter/sec.","type":"number","readOnly":false,"writeOnly":false,"observable":false,"forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/storageRack/properties/conveyorSpeed","contentType":"application/json","op":["readproperty","writeproperty"]}]}},"actions":{"pressEmergencyStop":{"description":"Turns off all active components of the machine: It sets the conveyor speed to 0, and a human operator is called to remove any items that have been placed on the conveyor belt.","forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/storageRack/actions/pressEmergencyStop","contentType":"application/json","op":["invokeaction"],"htv:methodName":"POST"}],"idempotent":false,"safe":false},"pickItem":{"description":"Picks an item from the storage rack and places it on the conveyor belt. E.g. to pick up the first item in the storage rack, the action must be invoked with input [0,0]. To monitor the state of the action, one can read the clamp status and the XZ-positions of the Cartesian robot. E.g. once the clamp is open again, the action has been completed.","input":{"type":"array","description":"Position of the item on the XZ-plane.","maxItems":2,"minItems":2,"items":{"type":"number"}},"forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/storageRack/actions/pickItem","contentType":"application/json","op":["invokeaction"],"htv:methodName":"POST"}],"idempotent":false,"safe":false}},"@type":"Thing","forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/storageRack/all/properties","contentType":"application/json","op":["readallproperties","readmultipleproperties","writeallproperties","writemultipleproperties"]}]}

{"@context":"https://www.w3.org/2019/wot/td/v1","id":"tag:fillingWorkshop","title":"fillingWorkshop","description":"DX10 filling workshop with a Cartesian robot, a filler (with a magnetic valve) attached to the Cartesian robot and a conveyor belt. The machine is configured such that: 1) once the optical sensor at the start of the belt detects an item, the magnetic valve of the filler opens and the Cartesian robot starts to move along the X axis (at the speed of the belt) above the item. 2) Once a preconfigured amount of product has been poured by the filler, the valve closes and the robot returns to its initial X coordinate at maximum speed while the item keeps moving towards the end of the conveyor.","securityDefinitions":{"with_auth":{"scheme":"basic"}},"security":["with_auth"],"properties":{"stackLightStatus":{"readOnly":true,"description":"Reads the status of the workshop (e.g. the status is 'yellow' when the workshop is resetting.)","enum":["green","yellow","red"],"writeOnly":false,"observable":false,"forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/fillingWorkshop/properties/stackLightStatus","contentType":"application/json","op":["readproperty"],"htv:methodName":"GET"}]},"conveyorSpeed":{"description":"Reads and writes the speed (X axis) of the conveyor belt (and the Cartesian robot that moves along the belt) (in meters/sec). The maximum speed is 1 meter/sec.","type":"number","readOnly":false,"writeOnly":false,"observable":false,"forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/fillingWorkshop/properties/conveyorSpeed","contentType":"application/json","op":["readproperty","writeproperty"]}]},"conveyorHeadStatus":{"readOnly":true,"description":"Reads the status of the optical sensor that detects whether an item is positioned at the end of the conveyor belt.","type":"boolean","writeOnly":false,"observable":false,"forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/fillingWorkshop/properties/conveyorHeadStatus","contentType":"application/json","op":["readproperty"],"htv:methodName":"GET"}]},"magneticValveStatus":{"readOnly":true,"description":"Reads the status of the magnetic valve which controls the product flow of the tank. When the status is true, product (e.g. yogurt) is flowing from the tank to an item (e.g. a container).","type":"boolean","writeOnly":false,"observable":false,"forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/fillingWorkshop/properties/magneticValveStatus","contentType":"application/json","op":["readproperty"],"htv:methodName":"GET"}]},"opticalSensorStatus":{"readOnly":true,"description":"Reads the status of the optical sensor that detects whether an item is positioned at the start of the conveyor belt under the filler.","type":"boolean","writeOnly":false,"observable":false,"forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/fillingWorkshop/properties/opticalSensorStatus","contentType":"application/json","op":["readproperty"],"htv:methodName":"GET"}]},"tankLevel":{"readOnly":true,"description":"Reads the quantity of product in the tank (in liters).","type":"number","writeOnly":false,"observable":false,"forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/fillingWorkshop/properties/tankLevel","contentType":"application/json","op":["readproperty"],"htv:methodName":"GET"}]},"positionX":{"readOnly":true,"description":"Reads the position of the Cartesian motor on the X axis (in meters).","type":"number","writeOnly":false,"observable":false,"forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/fillingWorkshop/properties/positionX","contentType":"application/json","op":["readproperty"],"htv:methodName":"GET"}]}},"actions":{"pressEmergencyStop":{"description":"Turns off all active components of the machine: It sets the conveyor speed to 0, it closes the filler`s magnetic valve, it returns the Cartesian robot (and the attached filler) to its home position at the start of the belt, and a human operator is called to remove any items that have been placed on the conveyor belt.","forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/fillingWorkshop/actions/pressEmergencyStop","contentType":"application/json","op":["invokeaction"],"htv:methodName":"POST"}],"idempotent":false,"safe":false}},"@type":"Thing","forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/fillingWorkshop/all/properties","contentType":"application/json","op":["readallproperties","readmultipleproperties","writeallproperties","writemultipleproperties"]}]}

{"@context":"https://www.w3.org/2019/wot/td/v1","id":"tag:cupProvider","title":"cupProvider","securityDefinitions":{"with_auth":{"scheme":"basic"}},"security":["with_auth"],"actions":{"order":{"description":"order a certain quantity of cups","input":{"type":"integer"},"forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/cupProvider/actions/order","contentType":"application/json","op":["invokeaction"],"htv:methodName":"POST"}],"idempotent":false,"safe":false},"orderPackages":{"description":"order a certain quantity of empty packages","input":{"type":"integer"},"forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/cupProvider/actions/orderPackages","contentType":"application/json","op":["invokeaction"],"htv:methodName":"POST"}],"idempotent":false,"safe":false}},"events":{"delivered":{"description":"indicates how many cups have been delivered","data":{"type":"integer"},"forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/cupProvider/events/delivered","contentType":"application/json","subprotocol":"longpoll","op":["subscribeevent"]}]},"deliveredPackages":{"description":"indicates how many packages have been delivered","data":{"type":"integer"},"forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/cupProvider/events/deliveredPackages","contentType":"application/json","subprotocol":"longpoll","op":["subscribeevent"]}]}},"@type":"Thing","forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/cupProvider/all/properties","contentType":"application/json","op":["readallproperties","readmultipleproperties"]}]}

{"@context":"https://www.w3.org/2019/wot/td/v1","id":"tag:robotArm","title":"robotArm","description":"6-axis robot arm with an attached gripper.","securityDefinitions":{"with_auth":{"scheme":"basic"}},"security":["with_auth"],"properties":{"stackLightStatus":{"readOnly":true,"description":"Reads the status of the workshop (e.g. the status is 'yellow' when the workshop is resetting.)","enum":["green","yellow","red"],"writeOnly":false,"observable":false,"forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/robotArm/properties/stackLightStatus","contentType":"application/json","op":["readproperty"],"htv:methodName":"GET"}]},"inMovement":{"readOnly":true,"description":"Reads the movement status of the robot. The status is true if the robot is in movement.","type":"boolean","writeOnly":false,"observable":false,"forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/robotArm/properties/inMovement","contentType":"application/json","op":["readproperty"],"htv:methodName":"GET"}]},"grasping":{"readOnly":true,"description":"Reads the grasping status of the robot. The status is true if gripper is closed. The status is false if the gripper is open.","type":"boolean","writeOnly":false,"observable":false,"forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/robotArm/properties/grasping","contentType":"application/json","op":["readproperty"],"htv:methodName":"GET"}]}},"actions":{"pressEmergencyStop":{"description":"Turns off all active components of the machine: It opens the gripper, and it cancels on-going movement tasks.","forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/robotArm/actions/pressEmergencyStop","contentType":"application/json","op":["invokeaction"],"htv:methodName":"POST"}],"idempotent":false,"safe":false},"moveTo":{"description":"Moves the robot arm`s hand on the XYZ coordinate system.","input":{"type":"object","properties":{"x":{"type":"number"},"y":{"type":"number"},"z":{"type":"number"}},"required":["x","y","z"]},"output":{"type":"boolean"},"forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/robotArm/actions/moveTo","contentType":"application/json","op":["invokeaction"],"htv:methodName":"POST"}],"idempotent":false,"safe":false},"grasp":{"description":"Closes the gripper to grasp the item that is right under the robot arm's hand. The grasping is performed only if the gripper is currently open and an item is positioned under robot arm's hand.","output":{"type":"boolean"},"forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/robotArm/actions/grasp","contentType":"application/json","op":["invokeaction"],"htv:methodName":"POST"}],"idempotent":false,"safe":false},"release":{"description":"Opens the gripper to release an item.","output":{"type":"boolean"},"forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/robotArm/actions/release","contentType":"application/json","op":["invokeaction"],"htv:methodName":"POST"}],"idempotent":false,"safe":false}},"@type":"Thing","forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/robotArm/all/properties","contentType":"application/json","op":["readallproperties","readmultipleproperties"]}]}

{"@context":"https://www.w3.org/2019/wot/td/v1","id":"tag:dairyProductProvider","title":"dairyProductProvider","securityDefinitions":{"with_auth":{"scheme":"basic"}},"security":["with_auth"],"actions":{"order":{"description":"order a certain volume of dairy product","input":{"type":"number"},"forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/dairyProductProvider/actions/order","contentType":"application/json","op":["invokeaction"],"htv:methodName":"POST"}],"idempotent":false,"safe":false}},"events":{"delivered":{"description":"indicates what volume has been delivered","data":{"type":"number"},"forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/dairyProductProvider/events/delivered","contentType":"application/json","subprotocol":"longpoll","op":["subscribeevent"]}]}},"@type":"Thing","forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/dairyProductProvider/all/properties","contentType":"application/json","op":["readallproperties","readmultipleproperties"]}]}

{"@context":"https://www.w3.org/2019/wot/td/v1","id":"tag:packagingWorkshop","title":"packagingWorkshop","description":"XY10 packaging workshop","securityDefinitions":{"with_auth":{"scheme":"basic"}},"security":["with_auth"],"properties":{"stackLightStatus":{"readOnly":true,"description":"Reads the status of the workshop (e.g. the status is 'yellow' when the workshop is resetting.)","enum":["green","yellow","red"],"writeOnly":false,"observable":false,"forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/packagingWorkshop/properties/stackLightStatus","contentType":"application/json","op":["readproperty"],"htv:methodName":"GET"}]},"conveyorSpeed":{"description":"Reads and writes the speed (X axis) of the conveyor belt (in meters/sec). off all active components of the machine: It sets the conveyor speed to 0, and a human operator is called to remove any items that have been placed on the conveyor belt.","forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/packagingWorkshop/actions/pressEmergencyStop","contentType":"application/json","op":["invokeaction"],"htv:methodName":"POST"}],"idempotent":false,"safe":false}},"@type":"Thing","forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/packagingWorkshop/all/properties","contentType":"application/json","op":["readallproperties","readmultipleproperties","writeallproperties","writemultipleproperties"]}]}

{"@context":"https://www.w3.org/2019/wot/td/v1","id":"tag:factory","title":"factory","description":"Whole ITm factory, exposing bookkeeping properties","securityDefinitions":{"with_auth":{"scheme":"basic"}},"security":["with_auth"],"properties":{"deliveryBook":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"type":"string","date":"string","quantity":"number"},"required":["type","date","quantity"]},"readOnly":false,"writeOnly":false,"observable":false,"forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/factory/properties/deliveryBook","contentType":"application/json","op":["readproperty","writeproperty"]}]},"shippingBook":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"date":"string"},"required":["date"]},"readOnly":false,"writeOnly":false,"observable":false,"forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/factory/properties/shippingBook","contentType":"application/json","op":["readproperty","writeproperty"]}]}},"actions":{"reset":{"description":"Resets the simulation environment. It presses the emergency stop buttons of all workshops and orders new consumables from the providers.","forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/factory/actions/reset","contentType":"application/json","op":["invokeaction"],"htv:methodName":"POST"}],"idempotent":false,"safe":false}},"@type":"Thing","forms":[{"href":"https://ci.mines-stetienne.fr/simu/factory/all/properties","contentType":"application/json","op":["writeallproperties","writemultipleproperties"]}]}

name: Packages delivered
func:
msg.payload = "Delivered " + msg.payload + " packages"
return msg;

name: Yogurt delivered
func:
msg.payload = "Delivered " + msg.payload + " yogurt"
return msg;

name: Cups delivered
func:
msg.payload = "Delivered " + msg.payload + " cups"
return msg;

name: serializeXandYPosition
func:
var newpayload = { payload: [msg.payload["X"], msg.payload["Y"]] }
return newpayload;

name: requestData
serializeXandYPosition
verifyStatus
verifyStatus
percentageHandler
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload * 100;
return msg;

name: percentageHandler
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload * 50;
return msg;
